title: Who owns Appleton Way in Leland is it a private or public road? Is the road going to be fixed when the new dock is put in and maintained by the city of leland?
text:
Appleton Way appears to be owned by Leland. Officials plan a paved
road. Here's a recent story about the project:
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20110717/ARTICLES/110719723?p=all&tc=pgall
